You're absolutely right! I removed the "Outstanding" category and updated the cost breakdown to only show the three providers. The totals now reflect the actual costs by provider: - **Heather Mayone LCAT**: $7,100 (22 sessions) - **Dr. Emma Kolpon**: $2,120 (8 sessions) - **Renee Wolk, Ph.D.**: $1,400 (4 sessions) **Total**: $12,620 This gives a cleaner breakdown focused purely on provider costs rather than payment status.
